info.title: Swagger Petstore
info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.  You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).  For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters.

post.description: Driver Login with Username and Password

401.description: username and password are not correct

post.summary: create un assigned bulk of tasks
post.description: Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: Company ID. Later we may will not need this field, it may replaced by company authentication key

get.description: Start driver shift: make him in duty and capture start date
End driver shift: make him off duty and capture end date
get all tasks' history for each driver

post.summary: Admin Can Assign task to driver
post.description: Admin Can Assign task to driver

post.summary: Admin Can Reassign task to driver
post.description: Admin Can Reassign task to driver

get.description: Muliple tags can be provided with comma separated strings. Use tag1, tag2, tag3 for testing.
Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status values that need to be considered for filter

post.summary: Updates a pet in the store with form data

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: ID of pet that needs to be updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store

post.summary: Add a new pet to the store

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store

parameters.name: additionalMetadata
parameters.description: Additional data to pass to server
